item.description:
Pianist extraordinaire Kenny Werner says, "I want to continue to lose myself more and more in the bliss of music. Not only do I benefit from the intoxication, but the audience resonates with their own bliss. In this way, the music wakes us all to who we really are."

Come hear Kenny perform with a quartet of amazing musicians: Scott Colley - bass,
Antonio Sanchez - drums, George Garzone - sax

The Regattabar is located in the Charles Hotel at Harvard Square.
http://www.regattabar...

For more information, see http://www.getshowtix...
item.name: The Boston Jazz January Meetup- Kenny Werner Quartet
